embeds.title: Dreyfus (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Dreyfus
A versatile commander-type character. Rapier applies Weaken for DOT synergy; Longsword delivers powerful Earth burst damage; Lance builds Surge for devastating Critical Hit combos with Enhanced Surge. Also useful for resource gathering alongside Hendrickson.
